on august 6, i with the group og ochestra go to sutera haurbour for a biao yan!!! and i discover taht i wass so small adn ???? compare with wen eng..wen eng is a mysterious guy, i remember that i sama-sama diaa joun chinese ochestr....but he was so a ??? person...i want to talk to him....i felt a strange, very strange feeling.....i can not ever descrie it ....oit was so strage ....like he is a alien....i was so jeaolous at him..really

Oh my god, i am back again, today i go to the 2004 pcfair....i was so desperate because all the thing i also want to but .but i have no maney, hay this world is this de loh. ok.. i plan to save money to buy a mp3 player.. like tidak makan or find a job when the year is ended..I also find out that i cannot make a desicion easily.. this is my most serius problem iever have!!!

Today is 4 of august, early morning i already feel the feeling of rush and scared (because i had already been write down my name atleast 10+ times) then i come to school, the thing i happy about this day is the jay album, i am going to distribute it to everyone!!!!, but the bad thing come!!!!!! my bm essy did'nt corected, so i have to figure out a solution, so i find5 person to help me tyoe the 1500 word.. hahahah it is a long time i did't feel the feeling of berkerjasama....then back home. i fell bad because i have a hard time with my father..he is so studborn that i called him lau a pak....i sit in the car for 3 hour just looking at him searching for somthing that are ????? like me also.................hai, life is short, so you have to be happy with it every saat...
